Class AcidBase

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.chemistry.acidbase.AcidBase
public class AcidBase extends Object
pH calculations for aqueous solutions.

Provides tools for:

  • pH and pOH calculations
  • H+ and OH- concentration conversions
  • Buffer capacity analysis
  • Henderson-Hasselbalch equation

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    static double
    bufferCapacity(double totalBufferConc, double Ka, double pH)
    Buffer capacity (Van Slyke equation approximation). β = 2.303 * C * Ka * [H+] / (Ka + [H+])²

  • Method Details

    • pH

      public static double pH(double hConcentration)
      Calculates pH from hydrogen ion concentration.
      Parameters:
      hConcentration - [H+] in mol/L
      Returns:
      pH value

    • pOH

      public static double pOH(double ohConcentration)
      Calculates pOH from hydroxide ion concentration.
      Parameters:
      ohConcentration - [OH-] in mol/L
      Returns:
      pOH value

    • hConcentration

      public static double hConcentration(double pH)
      Calculates [H+] from pH.
      Parameters:
      pH - pH value
      Returns:
      hydrogen ion concentration (mol/L)

    • ohConcentration

      public static double ohConcentration(double pOH)
      Calculates [OH-] from pOH.
      Parameters:
      pOH - pOH value
      Returns:
      hydroxide ion concentration (mol/L)

    • pHtopOH

      public static double pHtopOH(double pH)
      Converts pH to pOH at 25°C. (pH + pOH = 14 at 25°C)

    • hendersonHasselbalch

      public static double hendersonHasselbalch(double pKa, double conjugateBaseConc, double acidConc)
      Henderson-Hasselbalch equation for buffer pH. pH = pKa + log([A-]/[HA])
      Parameters:
      pKa - acid dissociation constant
      conjugateBaseConc - [A-] concentration
      acidConc - [HA] concentration
      Returns:
      buffer pH

    • weakAcidpH

      public static double weakAcidpH(double Ka, double acidConcentration)
      Calculates pH of a weak acid solution. Uses simplified Ka expression: Ka = x²/(Ca - x)
      Parameters:
      Ka - acid dissociation constant
      acidConcentration - initial acid concentration (mol/L)
      Returns:
      pH

    • weakBasepH

      public static double weakBasepH(double Kb, double baseConcentration)
      Calculates pH of a weak base solution.
      Parameters:
      Kb - base dissociation constant
      baseConcentration - initial base concentration (mol/L)
      Returns:
      pH

    • bufferCapacity

      public static double bufferCapacity(double totalBufferConc, double Ka, double pH)
      Buffer capacity (Van Slyke equation approximation). β = 2.303 * C * Ka * [H+] / (Ka + [H+])²
      Parameters:
      totalBufferConc - total buffer concentration
      Ka - acid dissociation constant
      pH - current pH
      Returns:
      buffer capacity (mol/L per pH unit)

    • kwAtTemperature

      public static double kwAtTemperature(double temperatureK)
      Temperature-corrected Kw. Kw increases with temperature.
      Parameters:
      temperatureK - temperature in Kelvin
      Returns:
      Kw at given temperature (approximate)

    • classify

      public static String classify(double pH)
      Classifies solution by pH.
